sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { HCardState } from "common/types"; import { HCardViewSection, HCardViewContainer, HCardViewTitle, HCard, HCardHead, HCardTitle, HCardAvatarContainer, HCardContent, HCardContentContainer, HCardContentItem, } from "./styled"; interface Props { hCardState: HCardState; } export const HCardView = ({ hCardState }: Props) => { const { givenName, surname, email, phone, houseNameOrNumber, street, suburb, state, postcode, country, } = hCardState; return ( hCard Preview {givenName || "-"} {surname || "-"} Email {email} Phone {phone} Address {houseNameOrNumber} {street} {`${suburb}${suburb && state && ","} ${state}`} Postcode {postcode} Country {country} ); };
